services.name: Services
services.description: A well considered solution requires it's own unique approach.  No project is ever the same, and it's why you wont see formulas or checklists when working with me.

services.name: 01. User experience design
services.description: Using the Double Diamond design methodology allows me to deliver significant, long-lasting, positive change.

services.description:
I develop websites with the future in mind. For me, that means simple solutions backed with proven technology.
For you? Reliability and maintainability.
